title: Fart My Phone (supports Wear)
description: Get the best laugh and fart with this ultimate fart app for phone, tablet and Wear devices!Instructions:1. Set the volume with phone hardware keys2. Set the delay3. Press fart on phone or wear device4, Watch out for laughter storm!Supports also remote launch of fart from Android Wear device, such as Moto 360 or LG G Watch. Perfect for sneak prank fart attack...
descriptionHTML:
Get the best laugh and fart with this ultimate fart app for phone, tablet and Wear devices!

Instructions:
1. Set the volume with phone hardware keys
2. Set the delay
3. Press fart on phone or wear device
4, Watch out for laughter storm!

Supports also remote launch of fart from Android Wear device, such as Moto 360 or LG G Watch.

Perfect for sneak prank fart attack...
comments: Funny Too bad the volume is not loud enough.
this is what andriodwear was created for we have reach the promised land
